data.title: Lan Yu
data.meta_description: Adapted from the internet novel "Beijing Story," this is the story of a young gay student and his relationship with an older man set against the uprising of Tiananmen Square.  [Strand Releasing]
data.text:
Summary Adapted from the internet novel "Beijing Story," this is the story of a young gay student and his relationship with an older man set against the uprising of Tiananmen Square. [Strand Releasing]
